description.en: Two AI 'brains' (CLIP and T5) each read your text â€” the slider pushes the image far beyond what either would normally produce, into unexplored territory where surreal, dreamlike compositions emerge.
description.de: Zwei KI-'Gehirne' (CLIP und T5) lesen deinen Text â€” der Regler schiebt das Bild weit Ã¼ber das hinaus, was beide normalerweise erzeugen wÃ¼rden, in unerforschtes Terrain, in dem surrealistische, traumhafte Kompositionen entstehen.

context.en: The Hallucinator encodes your prompt separately through CLIP-L (visual encoder, 77 tokens, 768 dims padded to 4096) and T5-XXL (language encoder, 512 tokens, 4096 dims). First 77 tokens: (1-Î±)Â·CLIP-L + Î±Â·T5. Positive Î± extrapolates past T5 into linguistically driven hallucinations. Negative Î± amplifies CLIP-L and negates T5 â€” critically, the upper 3328 dimensions (where CLIP-L is zero-padded) receive inverted T5 vectors, flipping cross-attention patterns in the transformer and producing visually driven hallucinations with disrupted semantics. Remaining T5 tokens (78-512) unchanged as semantic anchor. Stage 2 skipped to preserve original prompt.
